title: reconnect to tutorial
body:
pressed play on tutorial instead of practice tool accidentally
alt+f4 immediately. 
now i only have a reconnect button and whenever i press it i get unknown directx problem.
how do i fix it?

replies.body: ok the directx problem has been fixed but its happens if i try to go to practice or a game (rip lp)

If you're still getting those DirectX errors, first make sure you've checked for those DirectX drivers to update them if needed, and I'd also recommend checking your graphics drivers as well. Let me know if that's not helping as the problem might actually be elsewhere.
unless it isnt clear- i cant play the game. its been over an hour. what can i do?
